category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TWP.ExecutionPosition.Text
preference.preference_description: Defines the text that is displayed as header of an Execution Position column in the Time Way Planner view of the Manufacturing Process Planner application. Valid Values: object_string - Property name for the execution position name. Mfg0Acronym - Property name for the execution position acronym.
